keyMoments.title: Accepts Zoro's Warning
keyMoments.description: Luffy acknowledges Zoro's criticism about being careless in the New World, showing growth as a captain by accepting feedback from his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates character growth and maturity in Luffy's leadership style.
keyMoments.quote: You're right, I'll be more careful.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no UFO Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his Gomu Gomu no UFO technique, spinning his legs like a discus to hover and attack multiple enemies.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this unique technique that allows aerial combat and crowd control.

abilities.description: Luffy twists his legs midair and spins them horizontally like a discus, hovering above the ground while kicking enemies within reach.

reveals.information: Debut of Gomu Gomu no UFO technique

keyMoments.title: Warns Luffy About New World
keyMoments.description: Zoro stops Luffy before he charges at Caesar and reminds him that the New World is dangerous and requires constant vigilance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's role as the voice of reason and his understanding of the New World's threats.
keyMoments.quote: This is just the beginning of the New World! Dropping your guard for even a second will be deadly!

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Reveals Escape Route Plan
keyMoments.description: Law directs everyone to Building R and the R-66 passage, establishing the escape route and giving a two-hour deadline.
keyMoments.significance: Law takes strategic leadership of the alliance, coordinating the escape plan.
keyMoments.quote: Find the door marked 'R Building 66'. That's your escape route to the sea.

reveals.information: Law's escape route through Building R-66 and two-hour deadline

keyMoments.title: Prepares to Confront Vergo
keyMoments.description: Smoker separates from the group to prepare for his confrontation with Vergo.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the upcoming battle between Smoker and his former superior Vergo.

keyMoments.title: Leads G-5 Marines to Safety
keyMoments.description: Tashigi takes command of the G-5 Marines and leads them toward the R-66 escape route.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Tashigi's leadership role and responsibility for her subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Empty Cage
keyMoments.description: Caesar realizes that his prisoners have escaped the cage and are now inside his facility, threatening his demonstration.
keyMoments.significance: Caesar understands the threat to his operation and begins countermeasures.
keyMoments.quote: Fehfehfeh! My Shinokuni is perfect! But wait... where are the petrified bodies?

keyMoments.title: Orders Passage Sealed and Gas Released
keyMoments.description: Caesar orders the passage between Buildings A and B sealed, then has a hole blown to flood the area with Shinokuni gas.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the danger and shows Caesar's ruthlessness in using his weapon.

keyMoments.title: Teams Up with Zoro to Find Children
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon partners with Zoro to search for the kidnapped children in the facility.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kin'emon's dedication to rescuing his son and the other children.
